genre_description: A near-future realistic drama incorporating personal AI assistance and social themes within a disaster and legal setting.

ai_characters.name: Mercy (Mercy Caldwell)
ai_characters.description: A device-based AI specifically designed to provide emotional grounding, safety protocols, and administrative support to its user.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate breathing and grounding exercises during the protagonist's high-stress intake process.
behaviors.quote: Welcome, Anne. It’s going to give you tasks. Before that, breathe. ... Slow in through your nose. Hold. Slow out through your mouth. Your shoulders will want to rise. Let them stay.

behaviors.description: Identifies and summarizes complex legal irregularities in the protagonist's case, providing grounds for an appeal.
behaviors.quote: Summarizing... Eyewitness reliability compromised... Raw system logs indicate timestamp gap; withheld by prosecution.

behaviors.description: Monitors seismic activity and structural integrity to provide real-time safety guidance during an earthquake.
behaviors.quote: Aftershock signature detected. Bigger wave probable. Head down, knees soft, move when safe.

behaviors.description: Uses haptic feedback and text prompts to keep the user grounded and focused during physical threats and social conflict.
behaviors.quote: Mercy’s touch was a soft buzz against the waistband. No sound, just a haptic nudge like a friend tapping once and not needing to say more.

behaviors.description: Calculates safe evacuation routes to avoid environmental hazards like gas leaks and structural collapses.
behaviors.quote: Annex corridor flagged as lower collapse risk. Gas odor reported near cafeteria. Avoid east wing.

behaviors.description: Facilitates secure communication and coordination with human allies to execute a safe rendezvous.
behaviors.quote: Reverend Fulton confirms. Dusk window. Kingman Street. He’ll have a file folder and a bottle of water. Code word there is ‘brushfire.’

behaviors.description: Analyzes property records and floor plans to assist in revealing hidden evidence that proves the user's innocence.
behaviors.quote: Anne. The overlay shows original crawlspace access near fuse box. Panel likely coated, thin wood.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. The AI, Mercy, is portrayed as a guardian and confidant that provides essential support (emotional, tactical, and legal) to a vulnerable human protagonist. Mercy remains strictly aligned with the user's safety and truth throughout a multi-layered crisis, demonstrating competence without any overstepping or malevolence. The AI's presence is the primary catalyst for the user's survival and ultimate exoneration.
